font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】n. 加冕，加冕礼：the act or ceremony of crowning a sovereign or the sovereign's consort
【例】When they first saw each other in royal clothing, the fine robes and shining crowns for their coronation, that was when they fell in love.
【近】enthronement, crowning
【反】abdication 退位
【派】coronate v. 加冕
【记】 源自crown
